title: Find the Missing Shipment
content:
terity is high enough, the chest will open. Inside, you'll find a Potion of Feather Fall and an Iron Flask. Opening the chest will mark the completion of the "Find the Missing Shipment" quest. You can also continue to explore the cave, which holds more treasures and chests to discover.

How to unlock Find the Missing Shipment

Acquired when approaching the gnoll horde at The Risen Road

Find the Missing Shipment Rewards

If Rugan and Olly died, pick up the chest and leave it unopened. Then when
